Instruction: In a large mixing bowl, mix flour, salt, and baking powder. Cut in the shortening until the mixture looks like coarse cornmeal.
Divide the dough into 10 equal pieces and shape each piece into a ball. Roll each ball into a circle about 1/4 inch thick on a floured surface.

Heat a skillet over medium heat. Cook each tortilla individually in the skillet for about 30 seconds on one side, then flip and cook for an additional 30 seconds until lightly browned. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.
In a large bowl, combine flour, baking powder, and salt. Cut in shortening until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
